metadata.title: Supplemental Information Dysregulated Type I Interferon and Inflammatory Monocyte-Macrophage Responses Cause Lethal Pneumonia in SARS-CoV-Infected Mice

body_text.text: week old BALB/c or Ifnar -/mice were intranasally infected with 1x 10 5 PFU of SARS-CoV. Mice were monitored for weight loss and survival. (B) 8-9 month BALB/c or Ifnar -/mice were intranasally infected with 100 PFU of SARS-CoV. Mice were monitored for weight loss and survival. (C-D) 7-9 week old BALB/c and Ifnar -/mice were monitored for weight loss and survival following MHV-1 (5x10 4 PFU/mouse, i.n.) (C) and PR8 (500 TCID50, i.n.) infection (D). These data represent 2 independent experiments with 4-6 mice/group.

BIBREF0.title: PerCp-Cy5.5-anti-IA/IE (M5/114.15.2), were procured from BD Biosciences or eBiosciences. APC/PE-anti-CCR2 (475301) was purchased from R&D systems
BIBREF0.venue: For surface/intracellular staining, cells were incubated with fluorochrome-labeled antibodies specific for mouse: BV510 or PECy7-anti-CD45 (30-F11) FITC-anti-Ly6G (1A8), PE/PerCp-Cy5.5-anti-Ly6C (AL-21), V450-anti-CD11b (M1/70)

BIBREF1.title: For monocyte depletion, anti-BST-2 antibody (Clone-X3TT, Bio X Cell: 200 µg/dose, i.p) or anti-CCR2 antibody (Clone: MC21, 25 µg/dose in 250 µl of PBS, i.p. (Mack et al., 2001) or control rat-IgG were administered at -6 hrs, day 1 and 2 p.i. Neutrophils were depleted using anti-Ly6G antibody (Clone: 1A8, 200µg/dose, i.p.) administered at -1, 1 and 3 dpi. For TNF neutralization
BIBREF1.venue: BALB/c mice were treated intraperitoneally (i.p.) with blocking monoclonal anti-IFN-I receptor (IFNAR) antibody (clone MAR1-5A3

BIBREF3.title: BioLegend) was injected i.p. at 125 µg per mouse at days 1

BIBREF4.title: Cytokine and chemokine estimation: BAL fluid were prepared and analyzed for CCL2, TNF and IL-6 using mouse ELISA Ready-Set-Go kits (eBioscience). IFN-β concentrations in BALF were measured using a Legend-Max mouse IFN-β ELISA kit

BIBREF5.title: RNA preparation from lungs and bone marrow cells and chemokine estimation by qPCR: RNA was extracted from the lungs of BALB/c and Ifnar -/-mice (Trizol, Invitrogen) or from bone marrow derived macrophages from naïve BALB/c and Ifnar -/-mice stimulated for 24hrs with IFN-β (500U/ml). mRNA levels were determined after normalizing each sample to HPRT. Specific primer sets used for qPCR were previously described

FIGREF0.text: Age and virus specific role for IFN-I. Related to Figure 1. (A) 7-9

FIGREF2.text: IFN-I and IMMs promote vascular leakage in SARS-CoV infected lungs. Related to Figure 1 and 4. (A) 7-9 week old BALB/c, Ifnar -/and MC21 treated BALB/c mice were intranasally infected with 3 X 10 4 PFU of SARS-CoV. At day 5 p.i. mice were intravenously injected with Evans blue dye. After 30 minutes, mice were euthanized, perfused via right ventricle and lungs were collected for Evan's blue quantitation. (B-C) Quantification of Evan's blue from lungs of SARS-CoV infected BALB/c, Ifnar -/and MC21 treated BALB/c mice. These data represent 3-4 mice/group/experiment. Data in C are represented as +/-SEM. *P<0.05, **P<0.01 ***, Related to Figure 3 and 4. Young BALB/c and Ifnar -/mice were infected with 3X10 4 PFU of SARS-CoV (i.n.). (A) Graphs represent total number of innate immune cells in the lungs at different days p.i. Data are derived from 2 independent experiments with 4 mice/group/experiment. (B) Lung harvested from BALB/c and Ifnar -/mice were analyzed for CCR2 ligand (CCL2, CCL7 and CCL12) and GMCSF mRNA at indicated time points (4 mice/group). (C) IMMs harvested from lungs of SARS-CoV challenged BALB/c and Ifnar -/were analyzed for intracellular CCL2 expression at day 3 p.i. (3 mice/group). (D) Bone marrow derived macrophages were stimulated with IFN-β (500U/ml) for 24 hrs and mRNA transcripts for CCR2 ligands were measured (3 mice/group). Data in B-D are represented as +/-SEM. *P<0.05, **P<0.01 ***, P < 0.001 Reduced pDC number and BALF cytokine levels in MC21 mAb treated mice. Related to Figure 3 and 4. Young BALB/c, Ifnar -/mice or MC21 antibody treated mice were intranasally inoculated with 3X10 4 PFU of SARS-CoV. (A-B) FACS plots and scatter plots show IMM depletion in Ifnar -/-, MC21 antibody treated lungs in comparison to BALB/c mice. (C) Bar graphs show pro-inflammatory cytokines and chemokine levels in BALF of control Ig and MC21 antibody treated BALB/c mice at day 3 PI. Graphs show mean +/-SEM of percentage cytokine/chemokine level. (D) FACS plots and scatter plot data show percentage and number of pDCs (CD11b -Ly6C + BST-2 + ) in control Ig and MC21 antibody treated mice. (E) Histograms show CCR2 expression on IMMs and pDCs (FACS plots). Data in C and D are represented as +/-SEM. *P<0.05, **P<0.01 ***, Mechanism of T cell apoptosis in SARS-CoV challenged mice. Related to Figure 6. (A-B) Flow cytometry analyses of FASL expression on IMMs and neutrophils and FAS on T cells (4mice/group). (D-E) Flow cytometry analyses of TRAIL on IMMs and neutrophils and DR5 on T cells (4 mice/group). (C) T cell apoptosis in control Ig treated versus anti-FASL treated mice (4 mice/group). (F) T cell apoptosis in control Ig treated versus anti-TRAIL treated mice (4 mice/group). (G) Flow cytometry analysis of intrinsic apoptosis molecule expression in T cells (3-4 mice/group). (H-I) Lung T cell apoptosis was measured in SARS-CoV challenged control Ig and anti-TNF treated mice at 5dpi, 3 mice/group, 2 independent experiments. Data in C, F, G and I are represented as +/-SEM. *P<0.05, **P<0.01 ***,
